title: Audit legacy scripts and document agentic workflow status
description: Audit legacy scripts for direct-inference vs agentic use, document decisions in plan/docs, and refresh CURRENT_STATUS to match execution plan.

title: Complete memory investigation controlled tests
description:
Phase 3.4 in ralph/plans/EXECUTION_PLAN.md and logs/memory-investigation.md. Goal: determine safe UMA memory envelope and whether cache flush mitigations work before any new model runs.

Current state (2026-02-02): tests not started. No long-running jobs active. Prior nohup unittest failed because `python` not on PATH; use `python3`.

Required steps:
- Start memory monitor before each test: `./scripts/monitor_memory.sh` (capture log path in logs/memory-investigation.md).
- Start vLLM: `./scripts/agentic/serve_vllm_model.sh deepseek` (or qwen3 if preferred; keep settings default unless changing plan/spec).
- Run controlled slices with mini-swe-agent (workers=1):
  - 1 instance: `mini-extra swebench --config configs/deepseek-livesweagent.yaml --subset "SWE-bench-Live/MultiLang" --split c --slice 0:1 --workers 1 --output logs/swebench-live-multilang/deepseek/c`
  - 2 instances: `... --slice 0:2 ...`
  - 5 instances: `... --slice 0:5 ...`
- After each run, record peak RAM/swap from monitor logs and summarize in logs/memory-investigation.md.
- Compare with vanilla evaluation harness:
  `cd /home/sailorjoe6/work/swebench/SWE-bench-Live && python3 -m evaluation.evaluation --dataset SWE-bench-Live/MultiLang --split c --platform linux --patch_dir <preds.json> --output_dir <eval_dir> --workers 1 --overwrite 0`
- UMA cache flush test: `echo 3 | sudo tee /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches > /dev/null` and record pre/post available RAM.
- Update ralph/plans/EXECUTION_PLAN.md and ralph/plans/SPECIFICATION.md with any new limits/mitigations discovered.
- Stop vLLM container when done: `./scripts/agentic/stop_vllm_model.sh deepseek`.

Notes:
- Use `python3` everywhere (no `python` in PATH).
- Keep workers=1 until memory limits confirmed.
notes: Previous note about a running nohup unittest was incorrect. The nohup command failed immediately because `python` is not on PATH; see logs/unittest-nohup.out ("nohup: failed to run command 'python': No such file or directory"). No long-running unittest is currently running. If tests are still needed, rerun with `python3 -m unittest discover -s tests -v` (optionally under nohup) and monitor logs/unittest-nohup.out for progress. Memory investigation steps are still pending after tests.

title: Resolve submodule working tree dirtiness

Decide whether to keep/move into repo logs or discard; if keeping patch, document in repo and reset submodule to clean commit. After cleanup, rerun bd sync and ensure submodules are clean.
close_reason: Moved untracked submodule artifacts into logs/archive and restored SWE-bench-Live evaluation.py; SWE-bench and SWE-bench-Live submodules now clean.

title: Generate agentic evaluation final report
description:
Generate docs/AGENTIC_EVALUATION_REPORT.md after all model runs complete. Inputs are logs/ and evaluation outputs under /home/sailorjoe6/work/swebench/runs.

Required inputs:
- Multilingual evaluation reports: /home/sailorjoe6/work/swebench/runs/swebench-multilingual/reports (run_id per model).
- Live-MultiLang evaluation results: /home/sailorjoe6/work/swebench/runs/swebench-live-multilang/eval-results/<model>/<split>/results.json.
- Prediction logs: logs/swebench-multilingual/<model>/ and logs/swebench-live-multilang/<model>/.
- Any model/runtime limitations from run logs.

Report sections (per spec):
- Environment details (container image, dataset shas, commit hashes).
- Metrics per model per dataset.
- Failures/limitations and mitigation steps.

If missing metrics, re-run pipeline evaluation with:
- `./scripts/agentic/pipeline_swebench.sh --suite multilingual --model <model> --workers 1 --loop 0`
- `./scripts/agentic/pipeline_swebench.sh --suite live-multilang --model <model> --workers 1 --loop 0`

title: Re-validate updated mini-swe-agent configs and reset evaluation testing
description: Re-run config tests, verify mini-swe-agent code updates for patch submission, and reset evaluation testing plan if prior results invalid.

title: Evaluate Qwen3 with mini-swe-agent
description:
Run Qwen3 evaluations after swebench-eval-397 completes. Use agentic wrapper scripts and pipeline evaluation per ralph/plans/EXECUTION_PLAN.md Phase 4.1.

Prep:
- Confirm no active runs: `python3 scripts/agentic/status_report.py`.
- Start memory monitor: `./scripts/monitor_memory.sh`.
- Start vLLM: `./scripts/agentic/serve_vllm_model.sh qwen3` (defaults per SPECIFICATION).

SWE-bench Multilingual:
- Predictions: `./scripts/agentic/run_swebench_multilingual.sh qwen3 configs/qwen3-livesweagent.yaml logs/swebench-multilingual/qwen3`.
- Pipelined evaluation (loop): `./scripts/agentic/pipeline_swebench.sh --suite multilingual --model qwen3 --workers 1 --loop 1`.

SWE-bench-Live/MultiLang (8 splits):
- Predictions: `./scripts/agentic/run_swebench_live_multilang.sh qwen3 configs/qwen3-livesweagent.yaml logs/swebench-live-multilang/qwen3`.
- Pipelined evaluation: `./scripts/agentic/pipeline_swebench.sh --suite live-multilang --model qwen3 --workers 1 --loop 1` (or run once per split when preds complete).

Wrap up:
- Stop vLLM: `./scripts/agentic/stop_vllm_model.sh qwen3`.
- Capture failures/limits in docs/AGENTIC_EVALUATION_REPORT.md notes section (or staging notes if report not started).
- If any config/runtime changes are needed, update ralph/plans/EXECUTION_PLAN.md and ralph/plans/SPECIFICATION.md.

Notes:
- Keep WORKERS=1 unless memory investigation explicitly allows higher.
- Output paths must stay under logs/ for report aggregation.

title: Update livesweagent configs for 64k tokens and streaming
description: Set model_kwargs.max_completion_tokens to 65536 and enable streaming in configs/livesweagent.template.yaml, regenerate configs/*.yaml, and run tests/test_swebench_configs. Update plan/status docs as needed.

title: Phase 1 alignment tasks (legacy scripts + timeout policy + blocked workflow + monitor runbook)
description:
Phase 1 alignment tasks from ralph/plans/EXECUTION_PLAN.md "Gaps / required changes" and docs/CURRENT_STATUS.md Phase 1 cleanup. These are prerequisites for long-running evals and for keeping docs consistent.

Tasks:
- Legacy script audit: review scripts/swebench_*.py (generate_predictions/report_metrics/pull_images/live_prepare). Decide keep/repurpose/remove and update docs to reflect status.
- Timeout policy decision: determine whether environment.timeout in configs should be removed/increased to comply with "no timeouts" constraint. Update SPECIFICATION.md + EXECUTION_PLAN.md with explicit decision.
- Blocked workflow: define a short checklist or doc snippet describing when to mark project BLOCKED and where to record it.
- Memory monitor runbook: document the required "start monitor before run" steps (docs or plan; avoid duplication).

Deliverables:
- Updated ralph/plans/EXECUTION_PLAN.md and ralph/plans/SPECIFICATION.md with final decisions.
- docs/CURRENT_STATUS.md updated to remove Phase 1 pending items.
